Content: Hi! We watched the movie you suggested last night :)
Hi there! I'm glad to hear that. What did you think of the movie?
It was funny! Didn't think I would enjoy it as much as I did
That's great to hear! Do you have any other movie recommendations or preferences?
Me? No, you were suggesting the movie to me
That's okay! How about your hobbies or interests? What do you like to do in your free time?
